welcome_message_body: Welcome to Orekhovo-Borisovo Yuzhnoye! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, historical landmarks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: СушиStore
restaurants.description: СушиStore is a sushi restaurant located in Москва.

restaurants.name: Мой Город
restaurants.description: Мой Город is a middle eastern restaurant located in Москва.

restaurants.name: Pizzburg
restaurants.description: Pizzburg is a pizzeria located in Москва.

restaurants.name: Easy Pub (Изи Паб)
restaurants.description: Easy Pub (Изи Паб) is a irish pub located in Москва.

restaurants.name: Хинкали Хаус
restaurants.description: Хинкали Хаус is a caucasian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free and unlimited access throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Domodedovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal dedicated to international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zhukovsky International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zhukovsky International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting "ZIA Free WiFi" from the list of available networks and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vnukovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Vnukovo Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Vnukovo Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, mainly serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain period of time.
